resources.string: Unable to open card template editor: note type not found

There are more new cards available, but the daily limit has been reached. You can increase the limit in options, but please bear in mind that the more new cards you introduce, the higher your short-term review workload will become.
If you wish to study outside of the regular schedule, you can use the custom study feature.

resources.string: This app is a fork of AnkiDroid. Please consider donating to the AnkiDroid team to support their work. The creator of Anki has also kindly allowed the use of AnkiWeb sync. If you\'d like to support him, please consider buying the iPhone version of Anki.
If you have any issues with this version, please contact me and not the AnkiDroid team. Happy memorizing!

resources.string: AnkiWeb is not affiliated with this app
Buried cards are not included in counts above.

Doesn't map 1 to 1 but probably still helpful
Support AnkiDroid, which this app is based off of
